properties.name: kgs.generator.alphabet
properties.description: Set of characters to be used for key generation

properties.name: kgs.generator.length
properties.description: Length of keys to be generated

properties.name: kgs.generator.quantity
properties.description: Number of keys to be generated in each iteration

properties.name: kgs.scheduling.active
properties.description: Indicates if the key generation task is to be executed

properties.name: kgs.scheduling.delay.initial
properties.description: Seconds to delay before the first execution of the key generation task

properties.name: kgs.scheduling.delay.fixed
properties.description: Seconds between the end of the last invocation and the start of the next key generation task
